title: Biden might invoke a Cold War-era act to boost domestic EV battery production
content:
President Joe Biden is thinking about invoking the 1950 Defense Production Act (DPA) to boost US production of critical EV battery minerals. The act grants the president emergency powers to alter domestic manufacturing policy in times of crisis. According to Bloomberg and the Intercept, the White House is considering adding minerals such as lithium, nickel, graphite, cobalt, and manganese to the list of items covered by the act.
